subs.text: It is not clear if @lenovoUS has ANY ability to escalate a serious customer satisfaction issue. To their credit, they did not request photos of the laptop from three sides. LOL (like the chat agent did). [link]

subs.text: This is worst customer service I have every experienced. After providing ticket number of laptop and details including serial number, the agent wanted (wait for it) photos. Refuses to escalate. No manager available is the excuse. [link]

subs.text:
"Whoever you are, no matter how lonely,
the world offers itself to your imagination,
calls to you like the wild geese, harsh and exciting
over and over announcing your place
in the family of things."

--Mary Oliver, Wild Geese

subs.text:
I've dipped my toe in two Twitter communities. One has about 100 members, very low traffic. The other has about 1000 members, some traffic, but minimal.

On Twitter, does the owner of a community have to approve each post?

Maybe Twitter communities are DOA?

My early reaction to the CNN+ streaming service: "Frothy" (among other things, I hate the video being darkened now and then (& hope they dump that "feature"...) but I'll hang in for now, given the low cost, hoping it will improve.

@CNNplus

subs.text:
Experimenting with CNN+service. Today (April 4) the "5 Top Things" was all about the Grammy awards. Yawn. Also, pace was really sluggish, with no way to skip to next point. 

Hope this feature improves.

subs.text:
Watched the first episode of "No mercy, no malice" the CNN+ show from Scott Galloway. Good interview with Mark Cuban about his CostPlus drug company that targets a 15 percent markup.

Ar end of show, Galloway had a moving interaction with a parent of a transgender kid. Wow.

subs.text:
I have subscribed to the new CNN+ service, it's $2.99/mo. if one signs up by April 26 the 1/2 off monthly price will continue in future. 

Several solid, widely respected journalists are on CNN+.

What do you think? will you try CNN+?

subs.text: @SamsungMobileUS has a huge advantage vs. other Android phones because of FOUR YEAR system updates + one extra year of security updates. Not quite as good as Apple, but from a practical standpoint equivalent. This applies to models priced well below flagship levels: A53 A73 A33.

subs.text:
Dear Twitter peeps: CC: @androidcentral @DigestAndroid @googledevs @SamsungMobileUS 

I help an elderly disabled veteran who uses a Samsung A50 phone. When he has an issue with his phone it would help ENORMOUSLY if I could remotely view his screen.

This problem can't be unique.
